parameters.name: DbType
parameters.description: The type of the database. For more information about the valid values of this parameter, see [DbType parameter](~~198106~~).

parameters.name: EnvType
parameters.description:
The type of the environment to which the database belongs. Valid values:

*   product: production environment
*   dev: development environment
*   pre: staging environment
*   test: test environment
*   sit: SIT environment
*   uat: user acceptance testing (UAT) environment
*   pet: stress testing environment
*   stag: STAG environment

parameters.name: Logic
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the database is a logical database. Valid values:

*   true: The database is a logical database.
*   false: The database is a physical database.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: PermType
parameters.description:
The permissions on a specific type of resources that you want to query. Valid values:

*   DATABASE: permissions on databases
*   TABLE: permissions on tables
*   COLUMN: permissions on fields
*   INSTANCE: permissions on instances

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The keyword used in the query. For example, if you want to query permissions on an instance, you can specify the endpoint of the instance, such as rm-bp144d5ky4l4r****.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

>  To view the ID of the tenant, move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner of the Data Management (DMS) console. For more information, see the "View information about the current tenant" section of the [Manage DMS tenants](~~181330~~) topic.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description:
The ID of the user. You can call the [GetUser](~~147098~~) or [ListUsers](~~141938~~) operation to query the ID of the user.

>  The user ID is different from the ID of your Alibaba Cloud account.
